tweets.text:
Just 14% of English rivers are of good ecological standard, according to the @EnvAgency.

Just 7% of the UK's woodlands are in a good condition, according to the @WoodlandTrust.

We think we're a green and pleasant land, but it's a myth. When are we going to value nature?

Thank you @ITVCentral for spreading the news about the outrage that is #Walleysquarrey in NUL The local community have such care for eachother while the @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency offer little hope @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #stopthestink

can‚Äôt even cope with this üíî fucking scandal. And they let this happen... @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 they are absolutely ok with this. They couldn‚Äôt care less. Heartless money grabbing. You f***ed with the wrong town we are so much better and stronger than you https://t.co/2SkzvG6YPV
